.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkShaderModuleCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_SHADER_MODULE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkShaderModuleCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkShaderModuleCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
* [[VUID-VkShaderModuleCreateInfo-pCode-parameter]] pname:pCode must: be a valid pointer to an array of latexmath:[codeSize \over 4] basetype:uint32_t values
